channel.title: Help help help not even expert knows this!
channel.description:
Ok so in my latest project theres 4 outpost your side wants to capture so you can tele there and defend it from the other team aswell as get better supplys from these outposts. The only thing is when you click on the npc to capture the outpost making your team tele to the defender spot not the attacking spot it only chanegs it for you. i want to know how to change it so everyone with Code: [code=text]hween09 = 0[/code] gets there [code=text] 0 [/code] changed to [code=text]1[/code] and the other teams [code=text]hween09 = 1[/code] to be changed to [code=text]hween09 = 0[/code] this is the code being used right now [code=text]if(NPCID == 57 && hween09 > 0) { hween09 = 1; sM("You have Captured this outpost for your faction."); } else if(NPCID == 57 && hween09 > 1) { hween09 = 0; }[/code]
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!!!! :)

item.title: Help help help not even expert knows this!
item.dc:creator: @mpsmpsmps mpsmpsmps
item.description:
@mpsmpsmps wrote:

make a new folder called hween09.java used in bs + Wl bases put the whole team in, or if you got pc working in your server you could leech your self!

Read full topic
item.source: Help help help not even expert knows this!

item.title: Help help help not even expert knows this!
item.dc:creator: @statsflamescape statsflamescape
item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

Ok so in my latest project theres 4 outpost your side wants to capture so you can tele there and defend it from the other team aswell as get better supplys from these outposts. The only thing is when you click on the npc to capture the outpost making your team tele to the defender spot not the attacking spot it only chanegs it for you. i want to know how to change it so everyone with Code:

hween09 = 0

gets there

 0

changed to

1

and the other teams

hween09 = 1

to be changed to

hween09 = 0

this is the code being used right now

if(NPCID == 57 && hween09 > 0) { hween09 = 1; sM("You have Captured this outpost for your faction."); } else if(NPCID == 57 && hween09 > 1) { hween09 = 0; }

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HELP!!!

Read full topic
